name: Winch
author: Hacktix
description: A simple Harmony-based mod loader for DREDGE.
latest_release_description:
## Winch v0.6.0
- Added WinchLauncher.exe which will detect if the installed version of DREDGE is from Steam or Epic and then launch it via the vendor (previously Epic would just not launch properly from the manager).

## IntroSkipper v1.0.1
- Fixed a newly introduced NRE that would leave you stuck on a black screen in DREDGE 1.5.4 (Epic Games version) 

**Generated From PR: https://github.com/DREDGE-Mods/Winch/pull/37**

name: Cosmic Horror Fishing Buddies
author: xen-42
description: A multiplayer mod for DREDGE using Mirror and Winch
latest_release_description:
- Write error message when trying to use EOS connection mode on Epic Games (unsupported)
- Users should still be able to connect via IP address with port-forwarding or using a VPN

name: Unity Explorer
author: bdlm-dev
description: Build of sinai-dev's Unity Explorer for DREDGE
latest_release_description:
Current builds of my DREDGE mods.
For Winch alpha-1.3
# Mods
- AdjustHoodedFigures
| Restart any failed Hooded Figure quests.
- ConfigChanger
| Creates Config.Json file allowing editing of base game attributes.
| More than 60 modifiable game attributes.
| Installation information in [README](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods#configchanger).
| Attribute information [here](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods/edit/main/ConfigChanger).

- EnableUnityExplorer
| Implements [UnityExplorer](https://github.com/sinai-dev/UnityExplorer)
| Altered UnityExplorer STANDALONE Mono available [here](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/DREDGE-UnityExplorer/releases)

# Changes
**Changelog**: https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods/compare/2023-04-27...2023-04-28
- Port all mods to alpha-1.3
- ConfigChanger
| Include custom attribute "removeBoundary" to remove out of bounds warning and events.

description: Makes the fish from the Recording Rarities pursuit replenish themselves just like every other fish
latest_release_description: No longer restocks relics, quests, and research parts. (I didn't account for these in first version)

name: Encyclopedia Lookup
author: nogarcia
description: A DREDGE mod that adds a button to look up fish in the encylopedia
latest_release_description:
First version! Either download the release manually and extract it to your Winch mod folder, or download the mod from the Available tab in the mod manager.

Press <kbd>L</kbd> while hovering over a fish to open the encyclopedia to the page containing the fish.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nogarcia/DredgeLookup/commits/v1.0.0

name: Persistent Markers
author: MegaPiggy
description: Markers will display consistently, without the need of equipping your Spyglass. Also makes the drop-off harsher for how soon icons disappear from view when looking away (otherwise it's annoying)
latest_release_description: First release

name: Custom Loading Screen
author: MegaPiggy
description: Replace the loading screen with your own custom image. Must be a .png, and will be loaded from Assets\LoadingScreen.png
latest_release_description: First release

name: Mo' Money
author: MegaPiggy
description: Allows customizing sell multipliers (i.e. 0.5x, 2x, 3x, and any other multiplier you want) of all fish and trinkets via editing json files.
latest_release_description: First release

name: Auto Resume
author: MegaPiggy
description: Presses the continue button as soon as the title screen first loads.
latest_release_description: First release

name: Randomizer
author: mmbluey
description: A (limited) randomizer mod for DREDGE, customizable via config.
latest_release_description:
Version 0.1.0 Randomizer release

- Releases via github actions
- Fish randomize difficulty, size range, HarvestableType, location
- Seeds are consistent per save-file *
- Per save-file seeds can be disregarded in favour of seed as specified in config using UseConfigSeed config flag

\* Save-file-specific seeds can currently only be 100% correctly tracked if Randomizer is enabled during creation of new save files. This only means that if you are to use Randomizer to play once, then on a separate occasion with Randomizer disabled, delete and create a new save in the same slot as before, the seed will be considered the same for the new save.

name: Tweaks
author: MegaPiggy
description: Various game tweaks for DREDGE
latest_release_description:
- Updated for 1.5.1
- Added 3 new settings to the miscellanous section. The first two were previously always enabled but now they have a setting.
   They will need to be transferred from the default config for people with a config from last update.
  - onlyActivateBoostWhenMoving - Make it so you can activate haste ability only when moving
  - sellExtraItems - Make it so you can sell Peculiar Engine, Sampling Device, pieces of treasure map
  - buyLockedLights - Make it so you can buy the Halogen, Tungsten, Incandescent lights without chapter progression

name: Dredge Hard Mode
author: DaSea
description: Adds a fun and very hard gamemode to DREDGE
latest_release_description: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SeaKestrel/HardModeDredge/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.4

name: Deep Submergence
author: twestpha
description: A mod for Dredge that adds a Submarine, new fish, and a storyline
latest_release_description:
A mod for Dredge that adds a Submarine, new fish, and a storyline
- Fixed siphon mod not working
- Fixed several quest bugs with progress
- Added first-time dialogue prompt with map item to help players find the Sea Base
- Added 2 new fish, not used in quest chain
- Switching quest/dialogue system over to data driven

name: Remove Player Map Marker

latest_release_description: Removes the marker on the map that signifies the players position and rotation
